sblist.title: SERVICE BULLETIN LIST
sblist.para: The SB List reflects the incorporation status of Service Bulletins edited by: THALES Avionics S.A. (Vendor Code F9111).
The SB List has the following five columns to indicate SBs and their status:
SB number (SB No.) This is the number of the SB. If no SB affects the manual content, the comment None is given.
SB Revision (SB Rev) This is the revision number of the SB.
SB Subject This is the subject of the SB.
Modification state (modification state) This is the equipment part number modification state of the unit.

Incorporation date (INSERTED Date) SB status or incorporation date is indicated in this column as follow: If the SB is fully incorporated into the manual, the incorporation date is indicated. If the SB is partially incorporated into the manual, the field is left blank. If the SB data does not affect the manual content, the comment NO EFFECT is given.
Incorporation date (INSERTED No.) This is the revision number of the updating Component Maintenance Manual (CMM).

note.para: The Service Information Letters (SIL) which affect the manual content are listed at the end of the table.

unlitem.para: The Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) conforms to ATA Specification No. 2200.
The CMM provides shop verified procedures that enable a mechanic to restore the component to its serviceable condition in the overhaul shop.
The Abbreviated Component Maintenance Manual (ACMM) is a brief version of the CMM, for simple components which require periodic maintenance and/or testing.
The ACMM/CMM is prepared by the Manufacturer for each Repairable or Overhaulable unit.

THALES Avionics Technical Publications use both metric and non-metric system of measurement. The system used in the original reference documents is given first, followed by the conversion into the other system in brackets.
